item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Four Bottle System – Bottles C and D

remarks.para: Both bottles and associated indications may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: For Combi, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits, and
Flight remains within 30 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Flight remains within 30 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

placard.para: Placard near discharge switch on fire control module located on the pilots overhead panel: "BOTTLE _____ INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
